titles.title: Special Operations and International Security Education Act
Special Operations and International Security Education Act
To prohibit the Secretary of Defense from eliminating or otherwise modifying certain programs of the National Defense University pending an assessment of such programs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Special Operations and International Security Education Act
This bill prohibits the Department of Defense (DOD) from eliminating, divesting, downsizing, or reorganizing specified programs of the National Defense University until DOD issues a related report to Congress.
